entity.description:
To run the test you need to run a component server (1.45 minimum). 
Go to a component directory and run :  
mvn talend-component:web "-Dtalend.web.batch=true" "-Dtalend.web.batch.timeout=1" "-Dtalend.web.port=8081"  "-Dtalend.web.batch.timeout=5"

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: tcomp_approved

entity.description:
component endpoint

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: component

entity.description:
This scenario will test all basic interaction with TCOMP component/index endpoint.

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: 1-component.index

entity.description: The default call, without any parameter, should be in English with all elements.
entity.name: component/index - default

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "q" parameter, the list length should be affected by the query.
entity.name: component/index - query - empty answer caused by query filter

entity.description:
Check the givens properties inside a components of the received list  
Related to bugs: TCOMP-2171
entity.name: component/index - content

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to false, the response should not contain any icons files.
entity.name: component/index - includeIconContent - false

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to false, the response should contain any icons files.
entity.name: component/index - includeIconContent - true

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to a wrong value, the response should not contain any icons files.
entity.name: component/index - includeIconContent with wrong value - default answer (false)

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "language" parameter set to "fr", the response should contain French words.
entity.name: component/index - language

entity.description:
This scenario will test all basic interaction with TCOMP component/detail endpoint.

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: 2-component.details

entity.description: Get the component list to work with it in the next requests.
entity.name: Get component list

entity.description: The error call, with a no "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with a empty content
entity.name: component/details - missing identifier - empty answer

entity.description: The correct call, with one correct "identifiers" parameter, should be in English with one component.
entity.name: component/details - identifiers (one)

entity.description: The correct call, with two correct "identifiers" parameter, should be in English with two component.
entity.name: component/details - identifiers (two)

entity.description:
Check the properties inside the components details  
Related to bugs: TCOMP-2171
entity.name: component/details - content

entity.description: The error call, with a wrong "identifier" parameter, should return a 400 status with a json content
entity.name: component/details - wrong identifier - 400

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "language" parameter set to "fr", the response should contain French words.
entity.name: component/details - language

entity.description:
This scenario will test all basic interaction with TCOMP component/dependencies and component/dependency endpoints.

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: 3-component.dependencies

entity.description: Get the component list to work with it in the next requests.
entity.name: Get component list

entity.description: Error call, without "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with an empty dependencies list
entity.name: component/dependencies - missing identifier - empty answer

entity.description: Default call, with one correct "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with a content including more than one dependencies
entity.name: component/dependencies - identifier (one)

entity.description: Default call, with two correct "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with a two components including more than one dependencies
entity.name: component/dependencies - identifier (two)

entity.description: Call using a wrong id
entity.name: component/dependencies - wrong identifier - error 500

entity.description:

entity.description: Call using a component id
entity.name: component/dependency - component

entity.description: Call missing the id
entity.name: component/dependency - missing id - error 404

entity.description: Call using a wrong id
entity.name: component/dependency - wrong id - error 404

entity.description: Call using a maven coordinate as id

assertions.value:
^== AdlsGen2Input

Mapper for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2

//configuration_start

=== Configuration

assertions.subject: ResponseJsonBody
assertions.value:
== AdlsGen2Input

Mapper for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2

//configuration_start

=== Configuration

[cols="d,d,m,a,e,d",options="header"]
|===
|Display Name|Description|Default Value|Enabled If|Configuration Path|Configuration Type
|configuration|ADLS input configuration|-|Always enabled|configuration|-
||Dataset|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet|dataset
|Configuration Avro|Avro Configuration|-|`format` is equal to `AVRO_ENABLED`|configuration.dataSet.avroConfiguration|dataset
|Chemin des blobs|Path to Blob Object|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.blobPath|dataset
|Connexion|ADLS Gen2 Connection|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.connection|datastore
|Nom du compte|Storage Account Name|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.connection.accountName|datastore
|Mthode d''authentification|Authentication method|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.connection.authMethod|datastore
|ID du client|ID of Azure active directory authentication application|-|`authMethod` is equal to `ActiveDirectory`|configuration.dataSet.connection.clientId|datastore
|Secret du client|Secret key for provided auth application|-|`authMethod` is equal to `ActiveDirectory`|configuration.dataSet.connection.clientSecret|datastore
|Suffixe de l''endpoint|Endpoint suffix|dfs.core.windows.net|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.connection.endpointSuffix|datastore
|Jeton SAS *|Shared Access Signature|-|`authMethod` is equal to `SAS`|configuration.dataSet.connection.sas|datastore
|Cl partage *|Storage Shared Key|-|`authMethod` is equal to `SharedKey`|configuration.dataSet.connection.sharedKey|datastore
|ID du tenant|ID of Azure active directory (tenant)|-|`authMethod` is equal to `ActiveDirectory`|configuration.dataSet.connection.tenantId|datastore
|Dlai avant expiration|Timeout|600|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.connection.timeout|datastore
|Configuration CSV|Basic CSV configuration and CSV Schema|-|`format` is equal to `CSV`|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration|dataset
||Basic CSV Format options|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions|dataset
|Encodage personnalis|Your custom file encoding format|-|`encoding` is equal to `OTHER`|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.customEncoding|dataset
|Sparateur de champs personnalis|Your custom field delimiter|-|`fieldDelimiter` is equal to `OTHER`|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.customFieldDelimiter|dataset
|Sparateur d''enregistrements personnalis|Your custom record delimiter|-|`recordDelimiter` is equal to `OTHER`|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.customRecordDelimiter|dataset
|Encodage|Encoding|UTF8|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.encoding|dataset
|Caractre d''chappement|Escape character|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.escapeCharacter|dataset
|Sparateur de champs|Symbol(s) used to separate fields|SEMICOLON|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.fieldDelimiter|dataset
|En-tte|Header size|1|`useHeader` is equal to `true`|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.header|dataset
|Sparateur d''enregistrements|Symbol(s) used to separate records|CRLF|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.recordDelimiter|dataset
|Caractre d''entourage du texte|Text enclosure character|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.textEnclosureCharacter|dataset
|Utiliser un en-tte|Set header size|false|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvFormatOptions.useHeader|dataset
|Schma CSV|Schema|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.csvConfiguration.csvSchema|dataset
|Configuration du delta|Delta Configuration|-|`format` is equal to `DELTA_ENABLED`|configuration.dataSet.deltaConfiguration|dataset
|Systme de fichiers|FileSystem|-|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.filesystem|dataset
|Format|Format of Blob content|CSV|Always enabled|configuration.dataSet.format|dataset
|Configuration JSON|JSON Configuration|-|`format` is equal to `JSON_ENABLED`|configuration.dataSet.jsonConfiguration|dataset
|Configuration Parquet|Parquet Configuration|-|`format` is equal to `PARQUET_ENABLED`|configuration.dataSet.parquetConfiguration|dataset
|===

//configuration_end"

entity.description:
Check the component language support.  
For now only the following languages are supported in most of the connectors:  
Default (en), English (en), Dutch (de), French (fr), Japanese (ja)  
Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: Component-language

entity.description: A non given language fall back to English
entity.name: component list - default language - English

entity.description: An unknown language fall back to English
entity.name: component list - unknown language - English fall back
